description.value:
Frequency once per day
Prerequisites Diehard, you have died at least once

Your past has left you numb to deathâ€™s call. The first time each day that you regain Hit Points while you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying}, you regain additional Hit Points equal to your level, and you neither gain the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} condition nor increase the value of this condition.

prerequisites.value: Diehard, you have died at least once
